data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The namespace "perlchartdir" refers to "Perl interface to
    ChartDirector".

    Currently, this namespace is a single module containing every chart
    types. In future, it may be divided into more modules as
    perlchartdir::PieChart, perlchartdir::BarChart, etc.

    ChartDirector is a very sophisticated charting library (see
    www.advsofteng.com for sample charts). There is a free version
    available, which can be freely redistributed and will not expire.
    The charts produced by the free version will contain a small (around
    7-pixel high) banner line at the bottom of the chart to promote
    ChartDirector, otherwise it is the same as the commerical version.
